title: Code for Boston
description: I've worked on a few projects with Code for Boston - an open source community focused on civic technology.

title: GogoaT
description: A web/PWA application for information on public transit in Boston.

title: Where do I Worship?
description: A web/PWA application for finding nearby houses of worship - churches, temples, etc.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Google Maps API, Google Places API

title: Tippa
description: An app to calculate how much to tip - as well as how to split the tip amongst friends.
